resume.skillmessage: I love challenges and am always interested in discover and learn new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: Curriculum based on what the job market is looking for in technology professionals. With content blocks divided into Front-End, Back-End and Computer Science. A course that addresses in addition to several hard skills the most important soft skills such as learning to learn, communication, personal knowledge, team collaboration, pro-activity and many more. Without a doubt one of the most interesting journeys I've ever had so far.

Technical level course in Computer Networks, with 3 years of duration. where I learned to design, implement, manage and integrate computer networks. I also learned how to create security solutions in these systems that are present all over the world and in all areas. With disciplines that study all environments related to networks: wireless, with cables, defined by software, IPV4 and IPV6. The security, routing and switching of these systems were also covered.

work.title: Tourism and Hotels as a Receptionist and Team Leader
work.description: My previous work experiences are somewhat irrelevant on this new journey of mine. However, I would like to highlight the teamwork and team leadership that I have acquired over the years working in the Tourism and Hotels area. Not to mention the good-vibes i bring and my easy going personality that I gained from years of experience working as a receptionist at a 5 star hotel in one of the most beautiful beaches in Brazil called Jericoacoara.
